query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `seoArticles` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `theme` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `keywords` longtext,
  `analyses` longtext,
  `criteria` longtext,
  `structure` longtext,
  `article` longtext NOT NULL,
  `qualityCheck` longtext,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ENKfpgkx2S962Xx.root --database NYSDZ3CUp62WRWmJyXH7Fz --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `seoArticles` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `theme` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `keywords` longtext,
  `analyses` longtext,
  `criteria` longtext,
  `structure` longtext,
  `article` longtext NOT NULL,
  `qualityCheck` longtext,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
